alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 8:30PM CDT until June 24 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DUBUQUE...NORTHWESTERN JONES...SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHEASTERN LINN COUNTIES... At 830 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hopkinton, or 13 miles southeast of Manchester, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hopkinton around 840 PM CDT. Monticello around 845 PM CDT. Jones County Fairgrounds around 850 PM CDT. Monticello Municipal Airport around 855 PM CDT. Worthington and Pictured Rocks Wildlife Area around 900 PM CDT. Camp Courageous around 905 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pictured Rocks Wildlife Area, Buck Creek, Camp Courageous, Jones County Fairgrounds and Monticello Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in the Quad Cities.
